name: Maze Backpackers Gold Coast
description:
Welcome to Maze Backpackers - Gold Coast! 

Just 200 meters from the golden sands of Surfers Paradise Beach, our hostel is your chill spot right in the heart of The Gold Coast.

Whether you’re here to ride the waves, munch on local grub, or dive into the nightlife, everything you need is super close by. We’re only a 5-minute walk from Cavil Avenue and a 20-minute drive from the big theme parks like Warner Bros. Movie World, Sea World, and Dream World.

Our place is comfy, affordable, and perfect for kicking back after a day of adventure. We’ve got great communal spaces where you can hang out, meet fellow travellers, and swap stories. 

Dive into the Gold Coast vibes with us—each day brings new fun and unforgettable moments!

New Year Package - Terms & Conditions
o	All New Year reservations are to be held by Credit Card and will be charged in full from 1st December. Please ensure that your funds are available during that time and any credit cards that decline, will have their reservations cancelled.
o	Once your reservation has been fully charged, it is then non-refundable/transferable.
o	You will need to provide the same credit card at check-in, for verification of booking.
o	Please ensure your email address is current so we can contact you if needed.

Group Bookings
o	Bookings of more than 6 guests are considered a 'group'.
o	In order to provide your group accommodation requirements, please fill out the group form. 
o	Any group booking which has not been authorized in advance, or has been made by several individuals/separate bookings to make it appear as though it is not a group “can be canceled or denied at any time' in advance or on arrival. We recommend following our group bookings procedure and filling out a group request. One of our team will then be in contact with you.
o	Any bookings of 5 guests in a 6-share dorm will not be guaranteed to be together and should you purchase the 6th bed/complete room, we will endeavor to provide you with a 6-share dorm to yourselves - however, at times this is not always possible.


Cancellation Policy
o	24-hour notice is required for all cancellations before check-in. Bookings should be cancelled by 2 pm one day before arrival.
o	All No-Shows will incur a 1-night (first night) charge per our cancellation policy.
o	There is a strict no refund policy so should you decide to cancel after you have paid for your reservation/accommodation at any time, we cannot issue a refund. This includes peak periods such as prepaid New Year bookings.
o	Christmas / New Year and prepaid bookings - see Christmas/New Year terms below.
